p: The inclusion criteria for the basic dataset were met by 13 368 cases reported from 12 countries during the study period 2009–2010 to 2016–2017 ( Figure 1). The number of reporting countries varied each season with France and Spain reporting the majority of cases (57% and 26%, respectively). Of the 13 368 patients in ICU with laboratory-confirmed influenza virus infection, 2806 (21%) died ( Table 1). The majority of cases were male (7604; 57%). The median age was 59 years (interquartile range, ±14 years; range, 0–104 years). Most of the cases (7566; 57%) were between 50 and 79 years of age, and 10% of the cases were 18 years old or younger.
